ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger really that good?
ygData.msgSnippet: +AD4-We also have Stun which will freeze +AD4-your monk to allow us to heal up. Just a side note about that.. stun lasts for 3 maybe 4 sec.. a tick is about 5
ygData.messageBody:
We also have Stun which will freeze
your monk to allow us to heal up.

Just a side note about that.. stun lasts for 3 maybe 4 sec.. a tick is about 5 seconds.. and on average you heal 2 hp per tick, i think its 3 when sitting or somthing? I dont play a melee class so i dont really pay attention to that, but i know thats close... Anyway you do the math...

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-
